about.title: About
about.description: Get to know a bit more about my life, my goals, and dreams

contents.name: My History
contents.description: Hi, I'm Santi, a hardworking graduate who wishes to become a top-level programmer one day. I currently live in Monterrey, Mexico where I work as a freelancer as Web and iOS Developer, I love to go out with friends, and enjoy spending time with my family.

contents.name: My focus
contents.description: My main focus is to get good at UI/UX design along with CSS tools to create and achieve the best user experiences in my products, I want to have developments that provide value, and look and feel professional.

contents.name: Hobbies
contents.description: My hobbies can be divided into 3 categories: 1. FPV Drone Flying. 2. Coding/Documenting/Researching/Learning and 3. Sport Climbing/Running/Basketball and stretching. Apart from that I love to travel, meet new people, and spend quality time with my lifelong friends.

contents.name: Hopes and dreams
contents.description: I've always pushed myself to become the best at what I do. Hopefully one day I can freely do those things that I enjoy the most: eat, travel, exercise, and fly. I hope to do all of this stress-free but always looking forward to a new challenge.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: Get to know about my work experience, my education, and courses

contents.name: Software Engineer & Data Analyst Intern
contents.description: Managed and created systems to record assistance and increase productivity within the business using Excel. Reports helped increment the on-time delivery process from 80% to the year's objective 96% by isolating and analyzing individual departments and their working procedures. Worked remotely under pressure with multiple daily, weekly and monthly reports. Responsible for individual KPI analysis and follow-up of over 700 American employees.

contents.name: Co-Founder and COO
contents.description: Full stack development of ScaaS (Supply Chain as a Service) platform zanco.com.mx NextJS, Zoho Creator and Zoho Books, API integrations, GitHub, Node.js, Mobile compatibility Android and iOS. Full development of a Notion System with the implementation of Notion's API. Helped to improve business operations performance by over 200%. Helped over 200 families in 3 months within my local area to disinfect their homes from Covid-19. Daily operation management of small teams driving the company's services.

contents.name: Software Engineer Intern
contents.description: Created a CRM using platforms such as Excel, Zoho CRM and Zoho Books that has had a huge impact in the automatization and optimization of the company's data and financial administration. Used SCRUM methodology to work at a fast and effective pace. Completed my milestones before due dates to run tests and deal with the company's transition and foster doubts and further system personalization. The system reduced working administrative hours from 20 hrs a week to 7 hours a week. Lead workshops to over 50 scouts in order to help increase the company's data health and increase individual scouting performance. I was then recognized for implementing detailed analytics that helped directives consult their data 20x more efficiently. Trained as a sales Scout for the company and have gained over 100 leads for their operation, increasing company’s revenue by 8% in only 2 months.

contents.name: Software Engineer Intern
contents.description: Developed invoice reconciliation system for JDE (Oracle ERP) vs SAT (Mexican federal government revenue service) using React.js, AzureDB, API integration, MSSM (SQL). Provided IT support and troubleshooting for the development team.

contents.name: Lead Designer & Project Manager
contents.description: Led the project as PM and Lead Designer, utilizing Figma and prototyping tools. Developed an app to assist songwriters in inspiration and repertoire organization using SwiftUI / UIKit, MVVM pattern. Integrated OpenAI API, Firebase, and Apple/Google authentication. Deployed on TestFlight with over 500 users in the first month.

contents.name: Apple Developer Academy, Naples Italy
contents.description: Focused on Swift Data, accessibility & storytelling to enhance an app experience and presentation. Developed over 3 apps on Test Flight

contents.name: Tecnologico de Monterrey, Campus Monterrey
contents.description: Studied and Graduated @ Tec de Monterrey in Computer Science and Technology Engineering (ITC), awarded leadership scholarship. 4.0/4.0 GPA

contents.name: Tec de Monterrey, Highschool CVA
contents.description: Graduated as best of my class, an honors student in the IB program, 4.0 GPA, student body president, Co-Founder of multiple high-impact social service groups aiming to maximize self-growth and encouragement in rural communities. Leadership medal awarded to only 5% of campus students within the leadership Program.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Don't hesitate to reach out for freelance opportunities, collaborations, or just to say hi!
